content.comment:
The list view titles are from the brand portal (whatever the brand wants here, usually it's the name of the brand or a short description)

Platform searches input string against
1) matching brand code exact name eg starbucks
2) search with brand prefix 'b.' + <search string> eg if user types coffeeshop search for brand code = 'b.coffeeshop'
3) search for partial matches or similar brand names
4) search for matching keywords/tags that the brand has pre-configured against their name (eg coffee)

Sort results according to current user's location vs Brand's location preferences
